scheduling.title: Hearing Scheduling
scheduling.content: Schedule court appearances, depositions, and meetings with proper notice and coordination. Check for conflicts and ensure all parties are notified.

calendar-sync.title: Calendar Integration
calendar-sync.content: Synchronize hearings with Google Calendar, Outlook, or other calendar systems. Automatic sync ensures all team members have current information.

preparation-tracking.title: Hearing Preparation
preparation-tracking.content: Track preparation tasks, document requirements, and witness coordination. Create checklists to ensure thorough preparation for each hearing.
